QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Thousand Needles!
QuestData.Description: All able bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Nyse at Mudsprocket. Join the Horde forces fighting against the renegade Grimtotems who dominate the area.$B$BNyse will provide you with transportation to the front lines. She will be waiting for you at Mudsprocket's inn, tucked away in southern Dustwallow Marsh.$B$BDestiny calls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Nyse at Mudsprocket in southern Dustwallow Marsh. Optionally, grab a flight there from Doras in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.RewardText: The Horde forces in Thousand Needles desperately need your help.
